## Create Art sprite for Non-Artists

- [How Non-Artists Can Use Free Software to Create Basic Sprites and Models](https://developer.amazon.com/blogs/appstore/post/6f274f74-7bee-4fc7-8dab-b1f66fdb2682/how-non-artists-can-use-free-software-to-create-basic-sprites-and-models-for-their-games)
- [How to Create and Improve Basic Art](https://developer.amazon.com/blogs/appstore/post/a09b823e-52ce-4606-8b2e-12c12f13a555/how-to-create-and-improve-basic-art)


## Design-resources-for-developers

- [design-resources-for-developers](https://github.com/bradtraversy/design-resources-for-developers)
